markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Platecarpus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1238)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The mid-sized platecarpuses are the most common type of mosasaur. They're typically 15 feet long, but larger specimens can grow up to 20 feet. The larger varieties sometimes eat Medium humanoids, but most stick to smaller fare.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Platecarpus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1238)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 178</row>

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Deep Breath** A platecarpus can hold its breath for 2 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 46

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, swim 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12,
**Damage** 1d12+5 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Aquatic Drag** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The platecarpus has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The platecarpus Swims up to half its Speed, carrying the grabbed creature with it.

**Strafing Chomp** <actions string="Single Action" />  The platecarpus Swims up to its Speed, making one jaws Strike at any point along the way. The Strike deals half damage.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Medium, 1d6+2 bludgeoning, Rupture 10

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-249" />
name: Platecarpus
